org.alienideology.jcord.bot.command

Annotation Type Command


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Command
    Command - A command annotation used on methods for the native command framework.
    Author:
    AlienIdeology

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] aliases
      An array of aliases for this command.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      The description of a command.
      boolean guildOnly 
      java.lang.String name
      The name of a command.
      Permission[] permissions
      Permissions required for the command to be triggered by a certain user.
      boolean privateOnly 

    • Element Detail

      • aliases

        public abstract java.lang.String[] aliases
        An array of aliases for this command. Different event can have different aliases.
        Returns:
        An array of aliases that would trigger the command.

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of a command. This can be accessed when building a help command.
        Returns:
        The name.
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        The description of a command. This can be accessed when building a help command.
        Returns:
        The description
        Default:
        ""

      • permissions

        public abstract Permission[] permissions
        Permissions required for the command to be triggered by a certain user.
        Returns:
        The permissions.
        Default:
        {}

      • guildOnly

        public abstract boolean guildOnly
        Returns:
        True if this event can only be triggered by IGuildMessageCreateEvent. Default is false: Can be trigger by all events.
        Default:
        false

      • privateOnly

        public abstract boolean privateOnly
        Returns:
        True if this event can only be triggered by PrivateMessageCreateEvent. Default is false: Can be trigger by all events.
        Default:
        false
